title: Power Type
description:
Power Types are what grants functionality to your origins! Each power has a type, specified with a type field in the JSON. Which type a power is defines which other fields it requires and supports.
Type: 'origins:modify_camera_submersion'
- Modifies how the player perceives the world, similarly to when they're submerged in fluids like water or lava.

to.description: Which submersion type to change to.
